words.vietnamese: hấp dẫn, lôi cuốn, thu hút

words.meaning: /kəm'peə/ v. to examine similarities and differences
/kən'sju:m/ v. to use something, especially fuel, engery or time
/ˈkən'vins/ v. to make somebody / yourselft believe that something is true
/ in'geidʒ/ v. to hire, to involve
words.vietnamese: dàn xếp để tuyển dụng một người; thuê một người

words.meaning: /fæd/ n. something that people are interested in for only a short period of time
/'inspə'reiʃn/ v. a thing or person that arouses a feeling
/'mɑ:kit/ v. to advertise and offer a product for sale
words.vietnamese: thị trường,chợ, nơi mua bán sản phẩm

words.meaning: /pə'sweiʤn/ n. the power to influence, a deep conviction or belief
/prəˈdʌktɪv/ adj. making goods or growing crops
/,sætis'fækʃn/ n. the good feeling that you have when you have achieved something
